Hello there!
Welcome to the world of Pokemon!
This world is inhabited by creatures called Pokemon.
For some people, Pokemon are pets. Some study them.
Others use them for fights.

Your very own Pokemon legend is about to unfold.\nA world of dreams and adventures with Pokemon awaits!\nAre you ready?
